Run '${HERITRIX_HOME}/bin/heritrix --help' to learn whats available from 
the command-line.  Start here, 
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual/outside.html#mon_com, to 
read on remote control of a Heritrix instance.  Let us know if 
insufficient hooking up your expert system.

Yours,
St.Ack
